name: Fine pâté
title: Gourmet Gold · Fine pâté · rabbit, beef, veal, lamb
description: Gourmet Fine pâté rabbit, beef, veal, lamb

mainInformation.origin: You can find information about the origin on the packaging in the store.

petFoodBasicInformation.composition: Composition: Meat and animal derivatives (58% of which rabbit 4%), minerals, Derivatives of vegetable origin, Various sugars. Composition: Meat and animal derivatives (57% of which beef 4%), minerals, Derivatives of vegetable origin, Various sugars. Composition: Meat and animal derivatives (58% of which veal 4%), minerals, Derivatives of vegetable origin, Various sugars. Composition: Meat and animal derivatives (56% of which lamb 4%), minerals, Derivatives of vegetable origin, Various sugars.
petFoodBasicInformation.additives: Additives: Nutritional additives: IU/kg: Vit A: 850; Vit D3: 130; mg/kg: Iron (II) sulphate monohydrate: (Fe: 9.8); Calcium iodate anhydrous: (I: 0.24); Copper (II) sulphate pentahydrate: (Cu: 0.80); Manganous sulphate monohydrate: (Mn: 1.8); Zinc sulphate monohydrate: (Zn: 17.6); taurine: 530. Flavourings.

usageInformation.additionalInformation: To offer your cat variety, you are always looking for a variety of menus that your cat will enjoy. That is why GOURMET™ has created Gold - Fine Pâté. With these delicious recipes you can spoil the demanding palate of your cat with unique taste experiences.

petFoodStorageInformation.instructions: For an average adult cat (4kg), feed 3 cans per day in at least 2 separate meals.The adult maintenance averages are based on moderately active cats at normal environmental temperatures. Individual needs vary and feeding should be adjusted as required to maintain your cat at a lean, healthy body weight.Serve at room temperature.Clean, fresh drinking water should always be available.

otherInformation.legalDesignation: Complete pet food for adult cats
otherInformation.distributorStreetAndNumber: (CH) Nestlé Suisse S.A., Nestlé Purina PetCare, CP 352, CH-1800 Vevey

remarks.value: Keep pet food in a cool and dry place.
